docs.snippet: Sir Eric Drummond, Secretary General of the League of Nations, who headed a commission from the Council of the League in December to attend the centenary of the Republic of Uruguay, arrived here yesterday ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sir Eric Drummond, Secretary General of the League of Nations, who headed a commission from the Council of the League in December to attend the centenary of the Republic of Uruguay, arrived here yesterday ...
docs.abstract: Arrives in U S for brief visit; denies League of Nations has internal interest in any country; comments on Briand plan

headline.main: LEAGUE PARTY PAYS BRIEF VISIT TO CITY; Sir Eric Drummond and Group Sent to Uruguay Stop Over on Way Back to Geneva. LAUDS PAN-AMERICAN AIMS Also Denies League Has Internal Interest in Any Country--Comments on Briand Plan.

docs.snippet: FLAGS of many nations are attractively massed in the large central gallery of the Baltimore Mu  seum of Art. They stand as index for the Pan-American exhibition of contemporary paintings now in progress (until Feb. 28).
